name: Golfing Over
description:
Ever heard of that old TV show Crossing Over? Well, welcome to Golfing Over.

It's like miniature golf with a dark and possibly disturbing twist ;)

This game was created for the Geo Jam in March 19-26, 2021. The theme is geometric shapes and the additional theme is The Other Side. You'll find both prominently displayed throughout this fun 9-hole golf game. There are a few hints once inside the game, but it gets a little difficult as you get further along. What was your best 'Final Score'?

Controls:  Left click for most things. Space bar to hit the ball. And... there's something else, but I can't quite remember what it was...

I made a golf game tutorial series on my YouTube channel about 2 years ago. The basic idea of game mechanics came from that project.

Follow me... because yeah!

YouTube

Twitter

Discord (bran-spankin-new, come say hi and help me get it started)

Music credit to Joshua McLean. All art and sound came from me or my extensive audio library that has been collecting various sounds from everywhere in the universe for decades!
